name: Little Red Riding Hood (Anselmo A. Peretto)
name_original: Little Red Riding Hood (Anselmo A. Peretto)
description:
"Little Red Riding Hood
Taking grandma some goods
Lost her basket of food
In the middle of woods.
Find the cake and wine
the axe is under a pine.
Look, another track, but
is it really a shortcut?"
